sourcesContent:
Register

{{ registrationError }}
import { Component, Injectable } from '@angular/core'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; import { UserService } from './user.service'; @Injectable({ providedIn: 'root' }) @Component({ selector: 'app-register', templateUrl: './register.component.html' }) export class RegisterComponent { private baseUrl = 'api/user'; user: any = {}; confirmPassword = ''; loading = false; registrationError = ''; users: any[] = []; constructor(private http: HttpClient, private router: Router, private userService: UserService) { } async register(): Promise { try { const emailExists = this.users.find((x: any) => x.Email === this.user.Email.toLowerCase()); if (emailExists) { this.registrationError = 'Email already exists.'; return; } const registerUrl = `${this.baseUrl}/register`; const response = await this.http.post(registerUrl, { Name: this.user.Name, Email: this.user.Email.toLowerCase(), Phone: this.user.Phone, Password: this.user.password }, { observe: 'response' }).toPromise(); console.log('Server Response:', response); if (response.status === 200) { this.userService.setUser(this.user); this.router.navigate(['/home']); alert('User registered successfully!'); } else { console.error('Unexpected server response:', response); // Handle the error case here } } catch (error: any) { console.error('Registration failed', error); // Handle the error case here } finally { this.loading = false; } } cancel(): void { this.router.navigate(['/login']); } }
